description: The Cheshiahud Lake Union Loop offers a scenic waterfront walk around Lake Union, providing stunning views of the lake and city skyline, ideal for a leisurely stroll.

Elliott Bay is a picturesque body of water in Seattle, offering stunning views of the city skyline, the Olympic Mountains, and Mount Rainier. It's a popular spot for kayaking, sailing, and enjoying waterfront dining, providing a quintessential Seattle experience.

Alki Beach is a popular beach park in West Seattle, known for its sandy shores and stunning views of the Seattle skyline. It offers a range of activities including sunbathing, beach volleyball, and kayaking, making it a favorite spot for locals and tourists alike.
The West Seattle waterfront offers stunning views of the Puget Sound and downtown Seattle, providing a picturesque setting for a leisurely stroll or bike ride along the water's edge.
David E. Brink Park in Kirkland offers stunning waterfront views of Lake Washington and the Seattle skyline, perfect for a relaxing stroll by the water.
Meydenbauer Park in Bellevue offers scenic views of Lake Washington, providing a peaceful escape for a leisurely stroll or a day of picnicking by the water.
The Foster Island Trail offers a peaceful nature walk through wetlands and forests, providing a serene escape from the city within Seattle's own Washington Park Arboretum.
It is a 19.1-acre public park located on the north shore of Lake Union at the south end of the Wallingford neighborhood.
